My Favorite Tunes

Alternative

Drag Path

Description: A powerful track from the Clancy era featuring experimental beats and deep lore-driven lyrics.

Artist: Twenty One Pilots

Pop / R&B

Description: A synth-pop and R&B collaboration known for its soaring vocals and moody production.

Apocalypse
